description:
Pursuing financial justice for those injured by the actions or inaction of others, we provide focused personal injury representation at the Anastopoulo Law Firm in Charleston, South Carolina. Our team has seen the upheaval that accident injuries may have on the lives of people who suffer them, as well as on their families, and we work to help them hold those responsible financially liable. We also provide workers' compensation services.

With eight office locations, we serve people living throughout the Carolinas. Our attorney's more than 25 years of legal experience includes handling cases involving issues such as the following:

  • Motor vehicle and truck accidents
  • Premises liability
  • Product liability
  • Birth injury and medical malpractice
  • Animal bites
  • Wrongful death

Over the years, our law firm has helped recover millions of dollars in judgments and settlements on behalf of our clients. Our notable successes include a $50 million jury verdict in a fatal trucking accident case, a $5 million judgment in favor of a driver injured due to a hit-and-run accident, and a $2.6 million judgment on behalf of a passenger killed in a motor vehicle collision involving a stolen car.

At Anastopoulo Law Firm, we work closely with each of our clients, offering them personal attention and tailored guidance. Beginning with free initial consultations, our attorney gets to know potential clients, discussing not only the specifics of their accidents but also how their injuries have affected their lives. We include this knowledge when calculating damages, and our team strives to help those injured through no fault of their own to recover the maximum compensation for their injury-associated losses.
